meanings.definition: A person or thing that fulfills a need or requirement.
meanings.sent1: The kind neighbor acted as a fulfiller by helping with groceries.
meanings.sent2: The fulfiller of the promise arrived right on time.
meanings.sent3: The helpful robot turned out to be the fulfiller of all their wishes.
meanings.sent4: The shining star in the sky seemed like a fulfiller of dreams.
meanings.sent5: The magical wand was the ultimate fulfiller of desires.

meanings.definition: Someone who completes or carries out a task or duty.
meanings.sent1: The diligent student was a fulfiller of all assignments.
meanings.sent2: The fulfiller of the mission was praised for their bravery.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy cat surprisingly became the fulfiller of catching the mouse.
meanings.sent4: The key was the fulfiller of unlocking the mysterious door.
meanings.sent5: The superhero was the ultimate fulfiller of justice.
